nodes.text: The Daltarri were a plant-based species that lived on the planet Daltarri.

Their bodies were green, with some orange-red "hair"-like extension on at least one individual visible. Their eyes were multi-faceted, like some insect's and they spoke through long, snout-like extensions from their faces. The Daltarri moved around on several tentacles and had two upper tentacles serving as arms.
They were allied with the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars, though appeared to not actively participate in the fight against the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

Anakin Skywalker was sent on a diplomatic visit to their world, to deliver seeds to their leaders in a gesture of goodwill. Daltarri believed strongly in the concept of allies who would aid them without questioning, a philosophy they explained to Skywalker during his visit.
